entries.journal_entry_description: You've agreed to learn the trade of personal protection, working as a bodyguard under Peawp R'dawc.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You have a contract to protect a courier carrying something valuable through the city. Meet him at this location. The courier is described as a alien of the Rodian species. He will present himself as Walter Orvett.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Talk to the courier and then escort him to the star port. Make sure that he's safe, be prepared for anything.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Talk to the courier and make sure he's okay by himself from here.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Return to Peawp and let her know that the contract is complete.
entries.task09_message_box_text: In Star Wars Galaxies, each skill "box" in your tree (lightning bolt icon in lower right corner) uses up a number of skill points. You only have 250 and will never get more. As a new player, you find that you have been granted all the novice skill boxes of the starting professions. If you want to free up some skill points, use the surrender skill button in the skill tree to forget ones that you don't want.
